loan.name: Mercy
loan.use: to buy a biodigester to transform her farm into a sustainable business.
loan.description:
Mercy and many coffee farmers are very curious. They are continuously searching and innovating to decrease production costs, but at the same time ensure the best coffee quality production.

Mercy saw that her neighbors installed a Sistema biodigester on their farms and she saw how the biodigester was making amazing changes in their crops. The cows' manure was transformed into a very potent and organic fertilizer and biogas (clean and renewable energy) through the biodigester.

Mercy wants to buy her own biodigester to reduce her reliance on expensive and non-renewable agrochemical fertilizers to increase the quality of her vegetables, processing the manure from her cows, helping both her wallet and the environment.

This loan represents 100% of the price of the biodigester.
loan.whySpecial: It saves farmers money by transforming waste into biogas and organic fertilizer.
